function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of compliance with social distancing measures","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Increase public awareness, enforce strict penalties for non-compliance","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, surveillance technology","People":"General public","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Unemployment leading to economic and social consequences","Impact":"Increased financial stress, reduced access to health care, social unrest","Mitigation":"Economic support packages, job creation programs","Technologies":"Online job platforms, economic forecasting tools","People":"Unemployed individuals, low-income communities","Owner":"Government, non-profit organizations"},{"Description":"Backlash against authorities leading to resistance to compliance","Impact":"Lowered effectiveness of public health measures, increased risk of disease spread","Mitigation":"Improve trust in authorities, communicate transparently, involve community leaders","Technologies":"Social media monitoring, community engagement platforms","People":"General public","Owner":"Government, community organizations"}]}
